serial_instrument module¶

Module contains class that abstracts serial instruments.

Methods:

get_PV - get present value from the instrument/sensor get_SP - get the set point value from the instrument/sensor set_SP - set the set point value for the instrument/sensor

class serial_instrument.SerialInstrument(instrument_port, socket_ip, socket_port)[source]¶

Bases: object

Base class to abstract serial instruments. The class provides user login by maintaing class attributes “user” and “password”. Class provides detailed logging for assisting GMP compliance. Logging configuration is determined by the logger configuration YAML file. Requests sent to the instrument (“process_request” entry point) are expected to be the following format:

{

“user”: user_name, “password”: password, “command”: {“name”: command_name, “parameters”: {dict_of_params}}

}

The “_update_data” method must be overloaded for inhereting classes. Additional methods are accessible from the “_execture_command” method.

process_request(request)[source]¶

Process the request

Arguments: request (dict): Request should be of form:

{

“user”: user_name, “password”: password, “command”: {

“command_name”, command_name, “parameters”: parameters”

}

} valid command names:

login logout get_data <any other subclass methods>

socketserver
